Sentence.value: Cancer staging can help your health care provider: - Determine your prognosis (chance of recovery or likelihood the cancer will come back) - Plan your treatment - Identify clinical trials you may be able to join Staging also gives providers a common language to use to describe and discuss cancer.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Cancer staging can help your [[health care provider|C0018724]]: - Determine your prognosis (chance of recovery or likelihood the cancer will come back) - Plan your treatment - Identify clinical trials you may be able to join Staging also gives [[providers|C1441436]] a common language to use to describe and discuss cancer.

Sentence.value: When cancer spreads, tumors can form in other organs and parts of the body.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: When cancer spreads, [[tumors|C0027651]] can form in other [[organs|C0178784]] and parts of the body.

Sentence.value: Lymph Nodes (N): - NX: Lymph nodes cannot be evaluated - N0: No cancer found in nearby lymph nodes - N1, N2, N3: Number and location of lymph nodes involved where cancer has spread Metastasis (M): - MX: Metastasis cannot be evaluated - M0: No metastasis found (cancer has not spread) - M1: Metastasis is found (cancer has spread to other parts of the body) As an example, a bladder cancer T3 N0 M0 means there is a large tumor (T3) that has not spread to lymph nodes (N0) or anywhere else in the body (M0).
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Lymph Nodes (N): - NX: Lymph nodes cannot be evaluated - N0: No [[cancer|C0006826]] found in nearby lymph nodes - N1, N2, N3: Number and location of lymph nodes involved where [[cancer|C0006826]] has spread Metastasis (M): - MX: Metastasis cannot be evaluated - M0: No metastasis found (cancer has not spread) - M1: Metastasis is found (cancer has spread to other parts of the body) As an example, a bladder cancer T3 N0 M0 means there is a large tumor (T3) that has not spread to lymph nodes (N0) or anywhere else in the body (M0).

Sentence.value: A tumor grade, such as G1-G4 can also be used along with staging.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: A tumor [[grade|C0441800]], such as [[G1-G4|C0687695]] can also be used along with staging.
